Reviews.Title: spy pen cam
Reviews.Author: Kent
Reviews.Content: decent price, it would be better if it has the real lid with real ink to write with. This is not the best quality, but you get what you pay for. Not too bad with $15.00 for a camcorder.

Reviews.Title: like it
Reviews.Author: manuel
Reviews.Content: I like it but you have to be careful it is too delicate and the lens has to be clean every time dust block the view keep it clean

Reviews.Title: crappy
Reviews.Author: Donald Smith Jr.
Reviews.Content: battery doesn't stay charged always having errors u definitely get what u pay for when it comes to this product

Reviews.Title: Ok for the price
Reviews.Author: Pinky
Reviews.Content: It did what it should. The "gold" finish in it is of inferior quality. Video quality is clean enough, but for best results, use with enough lighting (like outdoors)

Reviews.Title: Nice product, Good picture quality.
Reviews.Author: Judith Rice
Reviews.Content: I actually bought this for a deputy sheriff friend of mine to use at work.  The picture quality is very good, however theparts that twist together is loose and doesn't tighten down.  It has to be taped in order to keep it together.  He does likethe fact that it looks and also writes just like a pen.  Also that it is easy to use.price, and saved me more than I can say.
